Posts.Content: On Feb 14, 2013 3:07 AM nacina wrote: so very sorry paul ... it could have been her phone.. i heard of others having said that! I hope we all can start warning our loved ones that using cell phones, and especially iphones, if used improperly, can kill us! The Brain Tumor Institute already recommends avoiding cell phone use for children. It's only a matter of time before the dam breaks and manufacturers, like Apple, become libel for the killer products they've produced! Use Bluetooth, use ear buds, the speaker phone or whatever, but DO NOT put a powerful radiation source to your head!!! It's like putting a gun to your head! I wish I'd NEVER purchased iPhones for my wife!!! They killed her!!!!!!!! -Paul
